nodes.text: During the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, the ST-series military strategic analysis and tactics droid Aut-O commanded a large fleet deep within Separatist-controlled space. The fleet consisted of one Providence-class Dreadnought, at least five Recusant-class light destroyers, and at least three Separatist Gozanti-class cruiser variants. At some point in 19 BBY, the fleet was infiltrated by a squad of Republic droids led by the Zilkin Colonel Meebur Gascon, who were sent to steal an encryption module from the Providence-class Dreadnought flagship to decipher an intercepted and encoded transmission of General Grievous and discover what the Confederacy was planning.

The fleet first appeared, albeit unidentified, in "Secret Weapons," the tenth episode of the animated television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' fifth season, which originally aired on November 30, 2012.
